required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of Eye Health Benefits of Blueberry Chewable Tablets
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of Eye Health Benefits of Blueberry Chewable Tablets

brief_summary.textblock: To assess the efficacy of blueberry chewable tablets on Eye Health

primary_outcome.description: Schirmer's test determines whether the eye produces enough tears to keep it moist. Units: mm (in 5minutes)
Slit lamp Ocular Surface Analyzer is utilized to measure tear meniscus height. Units: mm

primary_outcome.measure: Changes of non-invasive tear break-up time (NITBUT)
primary_outcome.description: Ocular Surface Analyzer is utilized to measure non-invasive tear break-up time. Units: sec
Slit lamp ocular Surface Analyzer is utilized to measure fist tear break-up time with slit lamp. Units: sec
Speedy-I is utilized to measure the accommodative micro fluctuation test of the ciliary muscle. Units: HFC
The Ocular Surface Disease Index (OSDI) is a 12-item scale for the assessment of symptoms related to dry eye disease and their effect on vision. Units: point

secondary_outcome.description: Eye pressure is measured in millimeters of mercury (mm Hg).
Eye pressure is measured in millimeters of mercury (mm Hg). Units: mmHg

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes of Near point of convergence (NPC)
secondary_outcome.description: RAF rule were initiated in order to normalize NPC. Record as break/recovery. Units: cm
The Randot Stereotest is utilized to evaluate the depth perception. Units: sec

The test is utilized to evaluate to assess binocular motor fusion, specifically the extent to which a patient can maintain binocular single vision (BSV) in the presence of increasing vergence demands. Units: prism

The amplitude of accommodation is the maximum potential increase in optical power that an eye can achieve in adjusting its focus. It refers to a certain range of object distances for which the retinal image is as sharply focused as possible. Units: diopter

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes of Amplitude of Flipper facility
secondary_outcome.description: Vergence facility (VF) was measured by using a prism flipper to evaluate the ability of the fusional vergence at near with +/-2.00 flipper. Units: cpm
The fundus is the back of the eye and includes the retina, optic nerve, and retinal blood vessels.

intervention.description: consume 2 tablets per day for 8 weeks
consume 2 tablets per day for 8 weeks

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adult men and women over 20 years old
- Use 3C products over 6 hours per day
- Symptoms of dry eyes or tired eyes
- Tear Break-Up Time is 10 seconds less
- No history of ocular surgery (strabismus surgery, refractive surgery etc.)
Exclusion Criteria:
- Have systemic diseases affecting the front surface of the eyes.
- Long-term use of drugs or eye drops that affect the condition of the front surface of the eyes
- Long-term contact lens wear
